alert.note: Alert for Madison; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:00AM CST until January 12 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN RANKIN...NORTHWESTERN SCOTT AND EASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 700 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Canton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Sharon around 710 AM CST. Farmhaven around 720 AM CST. Ludlow around 725 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
